body_text: Would a water manipulating Devil Fruit user be able to swim? If all Devil Fruit users in One Piece anime are not capable of swimming, what about a Devil Fruit user whose ability is to control water? Can such a person able to swim or evade the Devil Fruit's curse?

Logia Type Devil fruit user with power to control WATER We know that devil fruit users are weak against water and even if a part of body is submerged inside water they can't use their powers. 
So consider a Devil Fruit User who has power to manipulate water (hoping there isn't one already that I missed out). 
When Ace is fighting Blackbeard or Smoker, being a Fire-type he could walk through fire so going with the same logic, same should be the case with water type users.
Will he be an exception to the above rule?
